overview: Having studied at the Lycee Francais in London, leaving in 2006. Sam initially worked in digital advertising executive at Cake Group. Sam subsequently left in 2007 to work for a London based family office, where he was initially charged with investor relations and subsequently the capital raise for a Â£40m closed ended Property Fund. Sam was then the sales and marketing advisor for the Les Bordes development based just outside Paris having successfully sold â‚¬21m of debentures in an 18 month period. In January 2010 he set up Cavendish & Providence Ltd, a financial introductory that dealt primarily with Advisors, Wealth Managers and IFAs, having completed just over Â£32m worth of transactions. He has now set up C & P Capital LLP, a forward thinking capital raising business specialising in Tech based investments.
